channel.title: [Primitives] MY Riot Shield [Primitives]
channel.description:
[quote="chopstickz, post:4, topic:320844"][quote author=DeltaLegitz link=topic=417304.msg3068383#msg3068383 date=1261364669] Ughh dude imagine that ingame. You didn't put any thought into this, sorry but try again. [/quote]what u mean i didnt put any into this? -.- i would like to see u make one?[/quote]
I was asked to make it by chopstickz, so here is what I got. Please give me some "advice".
[IMG]http://i760.photobucket.com/albums/xx242/GodOfWarLS/NewItems/Shield2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i760.photobucket.com/albums/xx242/GodOfWarLS/NewItems/Shield1.jpg[/img]
It is all Primitives. Used a Cube.

item.title: [Primitives] MY Riot Shield [Primitives]
item.dc:creator: @chopstickz chopstickz
item.description:
@chopstickz wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:320854”]Tracing is not always with an image, like i said in your other thread, but lets drop it here before we start a war over nothing.

Also, about the “see through” yes you can see through that piece, he sent me a copy of the model before he posted it. Ill post a Preview of the see-through peice.
[/quote]yea, i was about to say lets drop it… kinda pointless… also im a begginer at modeling so i dont know much on Meta… first thing i learned was with Create so thats pretty much why… but i still say its more creative wen using Create>Line since u have to place stuff yourself and everything… if u can, can u teach me how to do perfect writin like that? =]

Read full topic

item.title: [Primitives] MY Riot Shield [Primitives]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Tracing is not always with an image, like i said in your other thread, but lets drop it here before we start a war over nothing.

Also, about the “see through” yes you can see through that piece, he sent me a copy of the model before he posted it. Ill post a Preview of the see-through peice.

Read full topic

item.title: [Primitives] MY Riot Shield [Primitives]
item.dc:creator: @chopstickz chopstickz
item.description:
@chopstickz wrote:

lolol dude, i still think mine is better looking… the thing to see threw its actualy see threwable… and for u CoonHunter i didnt use any traces… all from scratch from me… also if u didnt know, traces is wen u put a image and u trace it over, i didnt do that. i made the lines myself and moved it around to make it rectanglish and i dont know how to add my own writing so i did it with “create” but i was in a hurry so kinda ugly.

Read full topic
